x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact:
A ServiceNow-powered platform connecting young Nigerians and Africans to verified job, internship, and mentorship opportunities, using AI skill-matching and partner integration.

Impacts

  • Reduce unemployment rates by connecting thousands of youths to verified roles.
  • Empower youth with mentorship and training pipelines.
  • Provide real-time data on employment gaps and skills demand.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Youth unemployment in Africa remains a major socio-economic issue, with millions of graduates struggling to find work due to lack of visibility, skills mismatch, and limited employer access.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

This solution will use the products listed and not limited to the following;

  • Service Portal for candidate and employer onboarding.
  • Flow Designer to automate job-match notifications.
  • Now Assist / Predictive Intelligence for AI skill-recommendations.
  • Performance Analytics to measure placements and outcomes.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Yes, we'll make use of IntegrationHub for connecting to job boards (LinkedIn, Indeed etc) and also Now Assist for semantic skill mapping.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Data privacy for applicant info.
  • Reliable integration with external job APIs.
  • Ensuring verified and non-exploitative employers.
